name: John Chuma
bio: With over 8 years of experience in web design and digital strategy, Alex leads our creative vision. He specializes in brand identity and user experience design.

name: John Mwalimu
bio: Sarah is our technical lead with expertise in modern web technologies. She ensures every website we build is fast, secure, and scalable.

name: Julius Kiema
bio: Michael drives our digital marketing initiatives with deep expertise in SEO, social media, and paid advertising. He helps our clients achieve measurable online growth.

name: Michelle Maina
bio: Grace creates intuitive and beautiful user interfaces. Her background in psychology helps her understand user behavior and create engaging experiences.

name: David Nzuki
bio: David specializes in e-commerce solutions and web applications. His expertise in both frontend and backend development ensures seamless user experiences.

name: Ruth David
bio: Faith keeps our projects on track and our clients happy. With her attention to detail and communication skills, she ensures smooth project delivery every time.
